content: TE 70-ATC/AVR Rotary hammer Very powerful SDS Max (TE-Y) rotary hammer for heavy-duty drilling and chiseling in concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Rotary hammers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Active Torque Control (ATC) stops the tool body from spinning uncontrollably if the drill bit jams – helping to reduce a common safety hazard Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) makes the tool less tiring to use – helping to increase daily productivity Virtually maintenance-free brushless SR motor and double-chamber lubrication systems for longer service intervals and tool lifetime Detachable supply cord for quick and easy replacement of damaged/broken cords on the jobsite Highest productivity for a wide range of drilling and chiseling applications Applications Breaching and demolition with pointed and flat chisels Hammer drilling in concrete, masonry and natural stone with drill bits 1/2 - 6 in diameter Drilling holes for heavy-duty anchors from 3/4 - 1-3/4 in diameter ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 22 lb. Weight class: 15 lb. Single impact energy: 10.7 ft-lbs Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 22 lb | Weight class | 15 lb | Single impact energy | 10.7 ft-lbs | Hammer drilling diameter range | 15/32 - 5-29/32 in | Optimum Hammer drilling range | 25/32 - 2-5/32 in | Hammer drilling RPM | 245 rpm | Full hammering frequency | 2830 impacts/minute | Functionality | Active Torque Control (ATC), Chiseling, Power reduction, Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) | Triaxial vibration value for hammer drilling into concrete (ah,HD) | 8.6 m/s² | 1 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-Y, TE DRS-D | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 7.8 m/s² | 2 | Rated input power | 2100 W | A-weighted emission sound power level | 113 dB (A) | 3 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 103 dB (A) | 4 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3514171 - Combihammer perf pkg TE 70 ATC/AVR - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 70-ATC/AVR 120V Combihammer - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE 70-ATC/AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-YX 3/4-13 - 1x Pointed chisel TE-YX SM 36 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 2172149 - Corded Rotary Hammer TE 70-ATC/AVR 120 V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 70-ATC/AVR 120V Combihammer - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE 70-ATC/AVR Tool case assy
